snippet: The Texas Commission on Environmental Quality is appealing a lawsuit because of the judge’s statement that the state’s natural resources include the air and atmosphere.
lead_paragraph: The Texas Commission on Environmental Quality is appealing a lawsuit because of the judge’s statement that the state’s natural resources include the air and atmosphere.

headline.main: State Agency Appeals After Judge Calls Air a Natural Resource
headline.print_headline: State Agency Appeals After Judge Calls Air a Natural Resource
